name: WordFun
body:
WordFun
=======

A simple game written in Java programming language that selects a random word from a list of words (file) and asks the user to guess the word in a fixed number of tries. Similar to the well known "Hangman" game.

Information
===========
Language: Java (Oracle)  
Version: 1.0  
Year: 2009  
Requirements: JDK  

Instructions
============
See README.txt in sub folder "WordFun"

Video/Demo
============
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2y00YUAzie8

Background
==========
I created this project during my free time back in 2009 when I had one of those programming vibes.

Contact
=======
Prashanth Rajaram  
http://prashanthr.info  

Thanks for checking it out! Please feel free to leave feedback.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
